caption.courtNameFormat: IN THE CIRCUIT COURT OF THE STATE OF OREGON FOR THE COUNTY OF {COUNTY}

jurat.language: I, {NAME}, hereby declare that the above statement is true to the best of my knowledge and belief, and that I understand it is made for use as evidence in court and is subject to penalty for perjury. Executed on {DATE}.
jurat.federalOverride: I declare under penalty of perjury that the foregoing is true and correct. Executed on {DATE}.

implementationNotes: Oregon has FOUR critical format requirements: line numbering, footer with document title, paragraph numbering, and 2-inch first page margin
UTCR (Uniform Trial Court Rules) governs formatting — always check for county supplementary rules
Footer must include document title per UTCR 2.010(9) — this is frequently missed
Line numbering NOT required in federal court (D. Or.)
